column4: Could someone help me with my xorg.conf? Posted it to http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/50523/
Although I set 1680*1050 as an option for all screens, I can't set it for any of them
Dual Head is working and I can set resolutions up to 1280*1024
highest widescreen I can set is 1152*864 though :(
Anyone able to help me?
Pretty please?
what's the issue ?
checking the pastebin
i can't see anything wrong with it what's happening when you try to use the highest setting ?
I don'T even get the option to set it anyhwere
try to see if anyone have the same card as you  for myself i cannot see anyjthing wrong sorry
That's why I've been wondering. Everything seems alright, I just don't get the 1680 option to set anywhere
is there some cli command I could use?
checking
can't find anything of value for you
Thanks anyhow
your best bet would be to try to find a users that got the same card as you
Spent 2 days now trying to fix that stuff, reading tons of tutorials and forums. I'm just fed up with Linux for now and be back to Win I guess
i'm sure you will find out soon, keep it as a dual boot ;)
i never asked but what are the driver your are running for your card ?
After messing around with the open source and proprietary drivers from the repo I installed envy and got the original ones
Which at least allowed me to use dual head
you got it working nice  :) good toknow you'll stay with us :)
console based irssi :)
